Name: Nick Bounty and the Dame with the Blue Chewed Shoe
About the game: From the Writer/Designer that brought you Tales of Monkey Island, Puzzle Agent and Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People comes a comedy noir adventure! Nick Bounty and the Dame with the Blue Chewed Shoe is a comedic spoof on classic film noir detective movies inspired the classic adventure games of Lucas Arts and Telltale games. It's a little bit Maltese Falcon, a little bit CSI, and a little bit Naked Gun. Tired of scraping the bottom of the barrel for cases, smart-ass detective Nick Bounty takes on a real live murder case! Choose a partner, explore exotic locations, gather and analyze evidence to take down the killer of the dame with the blue chewed shoe! FEATURES Choose 1 of 3 sidekicks to help you solve the crime and customize your experience! Fully 3D characters and environments to explore. New evidence gathering/analyzing game play. Award winning voice cast including: Jason Ellis - (The original voice of Nick Bounty!) Dave Fennoy - (Lee Everett from The Walking Dead game) Melissa Hutchison - (Clementine from The Walking Dead game) Cissy Jones - (Delilah from Firewatch) Adam Harrington - (Bigby Wolf from The Wolf Among Us) ... and many more!
